metadata.title: CVE-2020-21244 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FrontAccounting 2.4.7. There is a DirectoryTraversal vulnerability that can empty folder via admin/inst_lang.php.

criterions.comment: frontaccounting: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
